attributes.action: Cancel the increase in fuel tax and further more lower it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the British public have to pay extortionate tax rates on our fuel. Resulting in the lowest earners of the country being hardest hit. We pay more than enough in taxes in this country as it is. Until there is alternate fuels widely available pricing the public of the road is not the answer and certainly not fair.
